document.full_text: sudan will hold a referendum on making darfur a single region in july, state media said on sunday, pushing ahead with a vote which would derail any peace talks to resolve a conflict that washington calls genocide.
document.title: darfur referendum set for july 1: state media
lines_and_colors: sudan will hold a referendum on making darfur a single region in july, state media said on sunday, pushing ahead with a vote which would derail any peace talks to resolve a conflict that washington calls genocide.
